game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden within an abandoned ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to find it and bring it back to the village elder.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must explore the jungle until you find the overgrown entrance to the ancient ruins.

task.objective: Solve the puzzle at the entrance
task.description: A riddle or puzzle must be solved to unlock the entrance to the ruins.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the heart of the ruins
task.description: The artifact is said to be in a chamber deep within the ruins, guarded by ancient traps and dangers.
